alert.note: Alert for Dallam; Hartley; Moore; Oldham; Potter; Sherman (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 28 at 9:09PM CDT until May 28 at 10:15PM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1015 PM CDT FOR NORTHEASTERN OLDHAM...NORTHERN POTTER...SHERMAN...SOUTHEASTERN DALLAM...MOORE AND EASTERN HARTLEY COUNTIES... At 909 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 8 miles northeast of Sunray to 14 miles southwest of Hartley, moving south at 30 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect some tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. Locations impacted include... Dumas, Dalhart, Hartley, Cactus, Fritch, Sunray, Channing, Four Way, Conlen, Boys Ranch, Masterson and Lake Meredith. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Dallam; Hartley; Moore; Oldham; Potter; Sherman
